channel.title: Dedicated Server
channel.description:
Can someone host my server on a free spot on there dedicated host.
As many noobs will say "they are bla blah blah a month and no one will do this"
They are alot a month but they can hold more then one ip.
Anyone!?

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @abbysal abbysal
item.description:
@abbysal wrote:

lol? whos ganna pay for your to be there?

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

If you think your going to get a free dedi, you can GTFO these forums.

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @Tai1 Tai`
item.description:
@Tai1 wrote:

I was just throwing an idea up there. About the spots on my server.

I’m not just saying that, I’m saying free. IF anyone says they won’t…GTFO my thread, Keep your dumb ass opinions to yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

[quote=“Tai`, post:9, topic:194492”]Naw, I have seen others get loaned. You just have to find the right person…If my grandma didn’t just spend 300$ to buy a lvl 94 on rs with 99 range and mage. I would be able to buy one…but now she wont…And I would share the remaining spots for FREE.[/quote]ur grandma sent you $300 to buy a runescape account? lmao. And good dedicated hosts (the very best) are up to $300 a month i think and for the bad ones its around $40. between $40-$300 for a dedicated host so i suggest you try and get some money up like $10 maybe and see if they will do it for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @xRedemptionx xRedemptionx
item.description:
@xRedemptionx wrote:

[quote=“Tai`, post:7, topic:194492”]Why the hell would you post that, I did not ask if anyone wanted a spot. I am asking for someone kind enough to share a spot on their dedicated host. I’m not gonna give them like 100$ a month for something like that.

Your spam on my thread is kinda [size=70pt]GAY!?[/size].[/quote]

You offered spots on your server here:

Tai`:

Errgh, they can have spots on my server… Or something I’m not going to pay rl money, for something they can do free

Lmfao, dumbass.

Read full topic
